verbs.description: [ARG0: Parkland shooting survivor and student activist Cameron Kasky] [V: called] [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARG2: a " professional liar "] [ARGM-TMP: following the President 's speech at the National Rifle Association convention in Dallas on Friday] .

Parkland shooting survivor and student activist Cameron Kasky called President Donald Trump a " professional liar " [V: following] [ARG2: the President 's speech at the National Rifle Association convention in Dallas on Friday] .
